story.text: ROME Jan 2 Capitalia CPTA.MI suspended board member Ernesto Monti after he was found guilty by a Milan tribunal of crimes related to the bankruptcy of Italian textiles group Trevitex in 1995, the Italian bank said on Tuesday. The tribunal found 36 people guilty in the case on Dec. 19. Monti was found guilty of preferential bankruptcy and bankruptcy by misappropriation.
story.title: capitalia suspends board member over trevitex affair
